p:
To test for the effects of animal imports on the probability of emergence, we fitted both linear ( Model 2a) and exponential ( Model 2b) models, without animal imports, therefore sampling from the posterior distribution of three parameters only θ = {imm_t
0 , a, b}. Finally, to assess the impact of NDVI seasonality on transmission, we fitted Model 3, a model with animal imports, but with a constant transmission parameter β, such as:
β
